I'll name her after the Princess." "You must stay here," Evelyn insisted. "I want all of you close by. Jack and Dad are at the market. Dad's been a huge help, donating much-needed items to the hospital. The Princess will send him in soon. Isn't it like a fairy tale that we had little Rika all along?" Warren looked serious.
